alert.note: Alert for Gregg (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 06 at 6:36AM CDT until May 07 at 6:11PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Shreveport LA has issued a Flood Warning for the following creek in Texas... Rabbit Creek At Kilgore affecting Gregg County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Rabbit Creek At Kilgore, Texas. * WHEN...From this Friday morning to Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...At 10 feet, Expect lowland flooding of timber resources in and near the creek. Some oil field operations may be affected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:45 AM CDT Friday the stage was 10.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum creek stage in the 24 hours ending at 5:45 AM CDT Friday was 10.3 feet. - Forecast...Rabbit Creek is expected to fall to 4.2 feet Tuesday evening. - Flood stage is 10 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. For more hydrologic information, copy and paste the following website address into your favorite web browser URL bar: water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=shv The next statement will be issued Saturday morning at 815 AM CDT.
